mapper.sql: rem_no, info_no, acc_type, acc_no, amount, exchange_rate, reason, rem_date, charge_acc_no, rem_charge, inter_charge, cable_charge, charge_cover, status, reserved_date, status_desc
mapper.insert: insert into hs_t_remittance ( rem_no, info_no, acc_type, acc_no, amount, exchange_rate, reason, charge_acc_no, rem_charge, inter_charge, cable_charge, charge_cover) values(seq_remittance_no.nextval, #{infoNo}, #{accType}, #{accNo}, #{amount}, #{exchangeRate}, #{reason}, #{chargeAccNo}, #{remCharge}, #{interCharge}, #{cableCharge}, #{chargeCover} )

insert into hs_t_remittance ( rem_no, info_no, acc_type, acc_no, amount, exchange_rate, reason, rem_date, charge_acc_no, rem_charge, inter_charge, cable_charge, charge_cover, status, reserved_date ) values(seq_remittance_no.nextval, #{infoNo}, #{accType}, #{accNo}, #{amount}, #{exchangeRate}, #{reason}, to_date(#{remDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{chargeAccNo}, #{remCharge}, #{interCharge}, #{cableCharge}, #{chargeCover}, 'RS', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select rem.rem_no, to_char(rem.rem_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rem_date, rem.acc_no my_acc_no, info.name, info.acc_no your_acc_no, info.currency, rem.amount, rem.status, rem.reserved_date from hs_t_remittance rem, hs_t_rem_info info where rem.info_no = info.info_no and info.id=#{id}

select to_char(r.rem_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as rem_date, r.rem_no, r.acc_no as my_acc_no, r.amount, r.status, r.info_no, ri.name, ri.acc_no as your_acc_no, ri.currency from hs_t_remittance r, hs_t_rem_info ri where r.info_no = ri.info_no

select count(*) countAll, count(case when status='IN' or status='RC' or status='ER' then 1 end) countDone, round((count(case when status='IN' or status='RC' or status='ER' then 1 end))/count(*)*100) percentage from hs_t_remittance where status != 'RS' and status != 'CA'
mapper.update: update hs_t_remittance set status=#{status}, status_desc=#{statusDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rem_no=#{remNo}
